snippet: Texas’ marijuana laws are considered less severe than the state’s tough-on-crime reputation would suggest, but analysts do not expect the state to legalize or decriminalize the drug anytime soon.
lead_paragraph: Texas’ marijuana laws are considered less severe than the state’s tough-on-crime reputation would suggest, but analysts do not expect the state to legalize or decriminalize the drug anytime soon.

headline.main: The Next Colorado or Washington: Probably Not Here
headline.print_headline: The Next Colorado or Washington: Probably Not Here
